f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db

Class CustomerDaoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDaoDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDaoDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO

    CustomerDAODB implements the Customer C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions in the DB using JDBC connection and SQL query.

    Purpose:The Application layer would eventually Creates Java Beans (Company, Coupon etc.)

    and would sent those to the DAO that will implement at DAODB and convert to SQL commands using JDBC.

    Since:
    2018-09-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Assaf Ben David

      CustomerDaoDB() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      createCustomer method used to create a new Customer entity in the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      void createCustomerCouponMap(long customer_id, long coupon_id)
      createCustomerCouponMap method add a new reference to the map table customer_coupon , meaning the Customer purchased the Coupon.
      boolean customerExistById(long customer_Id)
      customerExistById method check whether this customer exist by Id , or not, returns true/false.
      boolean customerExistByName(java.lang.String customer_Name)
      customerExistByName method check whether this customer exist by Name , or not, returns true/false.
      boolean customerPurchasedCoupon(long customer_Id, long coupon_Id)
      customerPurchasedCoupon method check it this customer purchased a specific coupon ,return boolean true/false.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCustomerPurchasedCoupons(Customer customer)
      getAllCustomerPurchasedCoupons method used to retrieve All Purchased Coupons, related to the Customer from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      getAllCustomers method used to retrieve All existing Customers from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      Customer getCustomer(long customer_id)
      getCustomer method used to retrieve specific existing Customer by Id parameter from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      long getMaxCustomerID()
      getMaxCustomerID method used to return id of the last Customer created.
      boolean login(java.lang.String custName, java.lang.String password)
      login method used to verify if the Customer Name combined with password exist in the DB using SQL and JDBS
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      removeCustomer method used to remove a existing Customer from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      void removeCustomerCoupon(Customer customer)
      removeCustomerCoupon method used to remove Customer's Coupon index reference from the map index table called "CUSTOMER_COUPON".
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      updateCustomer method used to remove a existing Customer from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
